Question: Stellar Telecommunications CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Stellar Telecommunications

Product: GLOBBLE
- GLOBBLE offers an all-inclusive solution for broadband connectivity on the move, providing perfect internet for camping tourists, car travelers, holiday home owners, and off-site event organizers
- Users can order the GLOBBLE service through InternetOnTheMove.com, receiving the router for free and enjoying 175 GB of data within a month for 169 EUR
- The GLOBBLE experience is "all-inclusive", "roaming-free in Europe", "subscription-free", and "plug-and-play" internet, powered by Stellar's proprietary AI software STEER
- GLOBBLE leverages multiple telecommunications networks (4G, 5G, Wi-Fi, Satellite) to ensure seamless connectivity on the move
- Stellar also unveiled GLOBBLE FLEET, a professional solution to solve internet drops for fleet operators
- The product was unveiled at CES Eureka Park and is available for pre-order with a discount for May 2024 delivery
Summary_cn:
星际电信

产品：GLOBBLE
- GLOBBLE提供了一个全方位的移动宽带连接解决方案，为露营旅游者、汽车旅行者、度假屋业主和现场活动组织者提供完美的互联网服务
- 用户可以通过InternetOnTheMove.com订购GLOBBLE服务，免费获得路由器，并在一个月内享受175GB的数据，价格为169欧元
- GLOBBLE的体验是“一切包含的”、“欧洲无漫游”、“免费订阅”和“即插即用”的互联网，由Stellar的专有AI软件STEER提供支持
- GLOBBLE利用多个电信网络（4G、5G、Wi-Fi、卫星）确保移动时无缝连接
- Stellar还推出了GLOBBLE FLEET，这是一种专业解决车队操作商的互联网中断问题的解决方案
- 该产品在CES Eureka Park上亮相，并正在接受预订，5月2024年交付时享受折扣价
